@notice Check in for today
 @dev Can only check in once per day. Resets streak if new month started.

devdoc.details: Tracks daily check-ins, current month streak, and best month streak

checkIn().details: Can only check in once per day. Resets streak if new month started.

returns._0: UserInfo struct with all user data
true if checked in today, false otherwise
